typography.title: Typography
typography.title_desc: Display different heading levels, from h1 to h5.
typography.ellipsis_desc: Automatically displays ellipsis when text exceeds specified rows, supports expand/collapse and hover tooltip.
typography.type_desc: Text colors for different semantic states.
typography.decoration_desc: Supports bold, italic, underline, strikethrough, mark decorations.
typography.lorem_long: Moin Design Language, dedicated to providing a complete and elegant UI component library for macOS applications. Built with native SwiftUI, deeply adapted to macOS design specifications, providing developers with high-quality out-of-the-box components. Our design philosophy is simplicity, efficiency, and beauty.
typography.lorem_ellipsis: Moin Design Language is a modern UI component library built specifically for the macOS platform. It is developed based on the native SwiftUI technology stack, deeply integrating Apple's design specifications and best practices. The component library provides a rich set of basic components, including buttons, input fields, selectors, tables, tree controls, etc., while also supporting enterprise-level features such as theme customization, internationalization, and accessibility. Our goal is to make macOS application development more efficient and enjoyable, enabling every developer to easily build beautiful and user-friendly desktop applications.
typography.token_desc: Token variables used by Typography component.
